description: Hitotsubashi Shingo is an ex-sumo wrestler who now has his eponymous construction company. In his sumo days, he was taken in by the politician Kuroda as he was from the same region of Japan. He therefore knows http://anidb.net/ch36033 [Suenaga Misuzu], and used to carry around http://anidb.net/ch36032 [Suenaga Mimi] as a baby.
name: Hitotsubashi Shingo
